The '''Crane Wing Formation''' is a [[collaboration technique]] used by seven members of the [[Suicide Corps]] after activating the [[Eight Gates|sixth gate]].

== Overview ==
The users line up side by side and enter the sixth gate. Upon doing so, they leap at their opponent, able to reach high up into the sky. The aura surrounding the users as a collective gives off the appearance of a crane's wings spread out — hence the name. When enclosing in on a target, the technique acts like a powerful blade, capable of destroying most of a gigantic meteorite.<ref>''The Last: Naruto the Movie'' novel</ref>
